ValidationRule.description: BGA_Dealer_Name_should_not_be_blank- Created on Mary McBride's request
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), RecordTypeId ='01230000000bN7l', ISBLANK( dealer_account__c ), TEXT(StageName) =="Closed won" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: BGA Dealer Name shouldnâ€™t be blank. Please select HONEYWELL DEFAULT ACCOUNT if the dealer is unknown
